edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.ContiguityEnhancedKMeansSegmenter

edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.ContiguityEnhancedKMeansSegmenter Class Reference

Objects consist of pixels that are grown from initial centers using K-means. More...

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 ContiguityEnhancedKMeansSegmenter (int min_thresh, int seed_value, int max_data_difference, int max_cluster_size)
 KMeans is seeded from points > seed_value, so pass in a high enough value here Only pixels > min_thresh are eligible to be part of an object.
List< LabelResult > label (LatLonGrid data)
 Creates a labeled grid where background pixels are set to 0 and labels for objects go 1,2,3.

Classes

class  Cluster

Detailed Description

Objects consist of pixels that are grown from initial centers using K-means.

Author:
v.lakshmanan

List<LabelResult> edu.ou.asgbook.segmentation.ContiguityEnhancedKMeansSegmenter.label ( LatLonGrid  data  ) 

Creates a labeled grid where background pixels are set to 0 and labels for objects go 1,2,3.

.. All pixels > thresh are part of an object. Returns a LabelResult for each iteration, with the last one being the final result. 

00132                                                    {
00133         List<LabelResult> result = new ArrayList<LabelResult>();
00134         final int nrows = data.getNumLat();
00135         final int ncols = data.getNumLon();
00136         
00137         // initialize based on simple thresholding at a high value
00138         final ThresholdSegmenter seeder = new ThresholdSegmenter(START_THRESH);
00139         LabelResult seed = seeder.label(data);
00140         result.add(seed); // first one
00141         
00142         // Start K-means
00143         int iter = 1;
00144         int n_changed = 0;
00145         do {
00146             // compute means
00147             Cluster[] clusters = findClusters(data, seed);
00148             // move pixels
00149             LabelResult next = new LabelResult(LatLonGrid.copyOf(seed.label), seed.maxlabel);
00150             n_changed = 0;
00151             for (int i=0; i < nrows; ++i) for (int j=0; j < ncols; ++j){
00152                 if ( data.getValue(i,j) != data.getMissing() && data.getValue(i,j) > MIN_THRESH ){
00153                     int closest = findClosestCluster(data.getValue(i,j),i,j,seed.label, clusters);
00154                     if (closest != seed.label.getValue(i,j)){
00155                         // change the label to closest
00156                         next.label.setValue(i, j, closest);
00157                         ++n_changed;
00158                     }
00159                 }
00160             }
00161             System.out.println("Changing " + n_changed + " at " + iter + " th iteration");
00162             // for next step
00163             seed = next;
00164             result.add(seed);
00165             ++iter;
00166         } while (iter < MAX_ITER && n_changed > 0);
00167         return result;
00168     }
